content:
I collected some thoughts on goals and approach here:
https://hackmd.io/@matt-long/B1AV7FOrU/edit

Comments, edits, discussion welcome.

@all,
We're not planning a collective kick-off Zoom call today. Please consider posting updates in your #hack-projects project topic.

@all, We'll begin the hack session tomorrow with a Zoom call. I don't have a specific agenda for this call, other than to touch base and promote general discussion.

Join Zoom Meeting
https://ncar-cgd.zoom.us/j/126622183?pwd=SEhUNnhTUkRzbXFvR0hQMm1RTENoQT09

Meeting ID: 126 622 183
Password: 229333

@all, I am thinking we'll skip a kick-off call today. Please consider posting updates on your hack projects.

I have been rethinking the nature of these events and welcome suggestions for how to make them more effective. As a transition step, I hope to solicit some help from the @geocat and @xdev teams to provide some mini-tutorials over the next several weeks. Feel free to add your suggestions and comments to this thread.

@all,
We would like to gauge interest in a mini-tutorial, presented by @Kevin Paul and @xdev. The topics this Friday would be:

  1. What is a Python module and how can you make one?
  2. What are unit tests and how can I add tests for my new module?
  3. How can I add my module to the hackutils package and share it with the community?

Please respond with :+1: if you are interested.

@all: I'm sorry to have to bail on everyone, but this has been an unusually hectic week for me. I do not see how I can throw together a mini-tutorial for you all by tomorrow with all of my existing commitments. I feel confident that I and @xdev can put something together for you all for the half-day hack session on June 19 (two weeks from tomorrow).

Again, I'm sorry for the inconvenience.

@all,
I will plan to lead a discussion tomorrow on workflow and project organization.

@all, We're planning a discussion at 1p today.

Join Zoom Meeting
https://ncar-cgd.zoom.us/j/126622183?pwd=SEhUNnhTUkRzbXFvR0hQMm1RTENoQT09

Meeting ID: 126 622 183
Password: 229333
